name: UISearchController
desc: A view controller that manages the display of search results based on interactions with a search bar.

items.name: init(searchResultsController: UIViewController?)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a search controller with the specified view controller for displaying the results.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Returns a search controller initialized from data in the given unarchiver.

items.name: init(nibName: String?, bundle: Bundle?)
items.desc: Returns a newly initialized view controller with the nib file in the specified bundle.

items.name: protocol UISearchControllerDelegate
items.desc: A set of delegate methods for search controller objects.

items.name: var searchBar: UISearchBar
items.desc: The search bar to install in your interface.

items.name: var searchResultsUpdater: UISearchResultsUpdating?
items.desc: The object responsible for updating the contents of the search results controller.

items.name: var searchResultsController: UIViewController?
items.desc: The view controller that displays the results of the search.

items.name: var isActive: Bool
items.desc: The presented state of the search interface.

items.name: var obscuresBackgroundDuringPresentation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the underlying content is obscured during a search.

items.name: var hidesNavigationBarDuringPresentation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the navigation bar should be hidden when searching.

items.name: var automaticallyShowsCancelButton: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the search controller manages the visibility of the search bar’s cancel button.

items.name: var automaticallyShowsScopeBar: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the search controller manages the visibility of the search bar’s scope bar.

items.name: var automaticallyShowsSearchResultsController: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the search controller manages the visibility of its results controller.

items.name: var showsSearchResultsController: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating the search results controller is visible when the search controller is active.

items.name: var searchSuggestions: [UISearchSuggestion]?
items.desc: Search parameters to offer as shortcuts.
